TextView.android:text: To issue a certified copy of Tax Declaration history of the real property reflecting its Tax Declaration Number, Owner, Total Land Area, Lot Number, Encumbrance & Memoranda from current down to its first property declation.
G2C - Government to Citizen\nG2G - Government to Government
Tax Declarant/Owner, Authorized Representative of the Declarant/Owner & Coordinating Offices
1. Accomplish Request Form and submit the required documents.
1.1. Provide Request Form and evaluate the required documents according to the Checklist of Requirements.
- If the evaluated documents are incomplete, ask for the Checklist of Requirements Form and secure the lacking documents.
1.2. If the submitted documents are lacking, return the submitted documents. Advise client to secure the required documents and give a copy of the Checklist Form. End of Service
- If the required documents are complete, pays the Records Verification fee at the Mun. Treasurer’s Office & submits the Official Receipt of payment to the Assessor Office
1.3. If the required documents are complete, let the client pay the Records Verification fee at the Mun. Treasurer’s Office & submit the Official Receipt.

10 minutes




5 minutes upon receipt of Billing Statement
2.1. Retrieves the OR of payment and prepares the Assessment Documents
2.3. Searches Tax Declaration of the property from current down to its first property declaration
2.5. Verifies the data entries & photocopy the tax declarations
3.1. Records documents in the logbook. Issues the Records Verification to the client.
4. Accomplishes the Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) form and drops in the feedback drop box.
4.1. Gives CSS form for service feedback. Instructs the client to place the accomplished CSS form in the feedback drop box.
